title: Elementary Language Education Course Design for Enhancing MOOC Instructional Design Quality

context.additional_context: A project-based assessment environment for beginner language learners among office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Apply organizational structure design principles of MOOCs at over 80% to enhance learners' language proficiency.
Use lecture evaluation tools to assess and propose improvements for at least three content delivery methods.
Incorporate instructional design strategies for enhancing interactivity into at least two real-world projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
